inclusion.criterion: gestational age of 34 weeks or over
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: initiation of PN with ILE within the first 48 hours after birth
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: congenital or acquired hepato-biliary disease, such as biliary atresia, choledochal cyst, inborn errors of metabolism, intra-hepatic familial cholestasis, infectious hepatitis, neonatal idiopathic hepatitis, biliary lithiasis and abnormalities of liver function tests
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: other congenital conditions affecting the liver function, such as meconium ileus associated with cystic fibrosis
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old Asian female infant presenting with jaundice. She was born at 38w3d of gestation after an uncomplicated pregnancy.
